segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks determined, balancing on that stool like a little acrobat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost see him grinning, even from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so patient, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her hand out, ready to catch a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she trusts her brother to share with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just a few feet away, but she's in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll be mad when she sees the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, it's a shame the kitchen is in such disarray.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they all realize what's happening before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit funny, but also a bit scary, watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
